I remember how I felt watching it. I was in such shock and was so worried about all those cops and Congressmen and Congresswomen just by watching it. I feel for them because it must have felt like being in war, but with nothing to protect themselves with. Horrible.

maga = We saw magat's best on Jan 6th>>>"hang Mike Pence" "we were gonna shoot Pelosi dead in her brains" "i'd rather be Russian than democracy"....<<>>... so maga.... tried to overthrow America and failed...smearing crap on the capitol walls.... so maga.... their camp are Literally TRAITORS..thankfully it is shrinking down into a toxic crapstew>>.  😂

I do not wish to sound angry or inflammatory, but I think Gallego was being a little soft or passive on what needs to be done about the fascist movement in this country. Yes, voting is important, but we need to invigorate and rectify the Democratic Party politicians, the Democratic party voters, the media and the Department of Justice. I am not sure how we can do this, but we must try. In their present state, these entities will just allow the fascists to steam-roll us. Look at the news. 
 They are allowing it even as we speak. Gallego mentioned something about "...they don't care about democracy. As long as they keep getting their fat tax breaks and deregulation" (I'm para-phrasing). Are the politicians in the Democratic Party secretly hoping that the coup is finally successful in 2022, so that their profit margin from stocks and shares increases?

There is something seriously wrong with Americans who are devoted to a tyrant who praised Putin, belittled our POWs and gold star families, refused to commit to the peaceful transfer of power, undermined our democracy with the lie of a stolen election, and incited an insurrection against America.
